title: Why isn't ther an indicator for the honor Rank???
body: I'd like to know my progress ^^

replies.body: We briefly touched on this in another topic, but essentially we didn't want Honor to feel like a grind when it first came out. If people had an honor exp bar, it might push some to beg for honors or play differently with that honor in mind. It's something that might be added in the future, but for now you can still see your current rank on your profile page.

I actually feel the opposite for me, i feel that the longer that its taking me to level up, the more it feels like a grind, I want to know how close i am to leveling, since i've played 300-500 games since the honor system was introduced, and i get at least 1 honor (sometimes three) every game, and it feels as though it will never increase...or if i have some kind of penalty going on thats stopping it from increasing, id very much like a indicator telling me this.
